properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 12:07PM CST until January 11 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Wichita KS
properties.description:
...Winter Weather to impact the area this afternoon through
Saturday...

* WHAT...Heavy wintry mixed precipitation expected. Total snow
accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one
quarter to a half an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Saline and McPherson Counties.

* WHEN...Until 4 AM CST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Trees, power lines
and elevated surfaces will rapidly become ice covered. The
hazardous conditions could impact the afternoon and evening
commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As temperatures fall well below freezing,
expect roads to become ice covered.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CST SATURDAY
